column4: I have a vmware related question: I'd like to configure a directory of some sort on my host OS (ubuntu linux, ext3 format) that both my guest os (XP pro) and host can manipulate. I just need this to be text files.. is this possible?
there are ext3 drivers for XP
Would it be possible to set it up so that vmware xp could only access a specific part of my real HD?
